#!/bin/sh

# default config
#             dataset chnl rndp a rndc mixupp
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# change randaug application probabilities
sbatch script.py hapt True 0.25 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 0.50 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 0.75 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# change mixup probabilities
# no mixup
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.00 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.05 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.15 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.20 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.25 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.75 deepconvlstm undef

## change max randaug applications (upper limit is exluded, for max=2 possible values are 0,1)
# no randaug
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 1 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 2 0.5 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 4 0.5 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 5 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# change mixup alpha hyperparameter
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.4 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.8 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# no chnl
sbatch script.py hapt False 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# only chnl
sbatch script.py hapt True 0.00 0.5 1 0.0 deepconvlstm undef

# only mixup
sbatch script.py hapt False 0.00 0.5 1 1.0 deepconvlstm undef

# only rndaugs ----------- last did this one
sbatch script.py hapt False 1.00 0.5 3 0.0 deepconvlstm undef

# opportunity - fails
# sbatch script.py oppo True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# pamap2 - done
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# pamap2 baseline
sbatch script.py pamap2 False 0.00 0.5 1 0.00 deepconvlstm undef

# pamap2 no mixup
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.00 deepconvlstm undef

# pamap2 mixup probs
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.25 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.75 deepconvlstm undef

# pamap2 only channel
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 1 0.00 deepconvlstm undef

# pamap2 only randaug
sbatch script.py pamap2 False 1.00 0.5 3 0.00 deepconvlstm undef

# pamap2 no randaug
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 1 0.25 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 1 0.50 deepconvlstm undef
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 1 0.75 deepconvlstm undef

# skodar
# sbatch script.py skodar True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm undef

# baseline hapt
sbatch script.py hapt False 0.00 0.5 1 0.00 deepconvlstm undef

# use single randaugs 

###### hapt single randaugs
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm jitter

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm moving_average

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm magnitude_scaling

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm window_warp

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm exponential_smoothing

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm magnitude_warp

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm magnitude_shift

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm time_warp

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm window_slice

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm random_sampling

sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.10 deepconvlstm slope_adding

###### pamap single randaugs

# use only jitter on adhoc best try
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm jitter

# moving average
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm moving_average

# magnitude scaling
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm magnitude_scaling

# window warping
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm window_warp

# exponential smoothing
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm exponential_smoothing

# magnitude warping
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm magnitude_warp

# magnitude shift
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm magnitude_shift

# time warping
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm time_warp

# window slicing
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm window_slice

# random sampling
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm random_sampling

# slope adding
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 deepconvlstm slope_adding


##################################
### Attend # ----------- not done ------------
# pamap2 baseline
sbatch script.py pamap2 False 0.00 0.5 1 0.00 attend undef

# hapt baseline
sbatch script.py hapt False 0.00 0.5 1 0.00 attend undef

# pamap 2 -adhoc best try
sbatch script.py pamap2 True 1.00 0.5 3 0.5 attend undef

# hapt adhoc best try
sbatch script.py hapt True 1.00 0.5 3 0.00 attend undef
